public class Filter
extends Grid
implements SpectrumOperator

This class describes a filter.

Constructor Detail

Filter

public Filter()
Creates a filter without setting any throughput values. If you use this constructor, ensure that the throughputs will be sert later.

Filter

public Filter(double throughput)
Creates a filter with the given wavelength-independent throughput.

Parameters:
throughput - the (wavelength-independent) throughput

Filter

public Filter(double[] wavelengths,
              double[] throughputs,
              int n)
Creates a filter the throughput of which is described by the given array of wavelength values and the array of corresponding throughput values.

Parameters:
wavelengths - the wavelengths (in A)
throughputs - the corresponding throughput values
n - the number of data points

Filter

public Filter(java.net.URL url)
Creates a filter the throughput of which is given in the file to which the given URL points.

Parameters:
url - the URL of the file containing the wavelengths and corresponding throughput values

Filter

public Filter(Grid grid)
Creates a filter the throughput of which is given by the specified grid of wavelengths and corresponding throughput values.

Parameters:
grid - the grid of wavelengths and corresponding throughput values
Method Detail

apply

public void apply(GenericSpectrum spectrum)
Applys the filter to the given spectrum, i.e. scales the grid ordinate values by the throughput values.

Specified by:
apply in interface SpectrumOperator
Parameters:
spectrum - the spectrum passed through the filter

name

public java.lang.String name()
Returns the string "filter".

Returns:
the string "filter"
